summary: This bill, the "Working Families Housing Tax Credit Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for working families housing development. It introduces a new section 42A, awarding a credit based on the qualified basis of qualified working families buildings. The bill defines key terms like "qualified working families building" and "qualified working families housing project." Furthermore, it authorizes grants and loans for infrastructure projects related to these housing projects, especially in rural and exurban areas, appropriating $100 million for this purpose. The changes apply to buildings placed in service after December 31, 2025.
